name: confluence-helper
description: Cross-browser extension for text color finding and manipulation

scripts.build:chrome: npm run build:content && npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/chrome && cp manifest.json dist/chrome/ && cp -r src/*.js dist/chrome/ && cp -r icons dist/chrome/ && cp popup.html dist/chrome/ && cp privacy.html dist/chrome/ && (cd dist/chrome && zip -r chrome.zip *) && cd ../..
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build:content && npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/firefox && cp manifest.json dist/firefox/ && cp -r src/*.js dist/firefox/ && cp -r icons dist/firefox/ && cp popup.html dist/firefox/ && cp privacy.html dist/firefox/ && (cd dist/firefox && zip -r firefox.zip *) && cd ../..

author: burtsevde
